exams.name: Digital Marketing Fundamentals Practice
exams.description: A practice test to assess your team's core digital marketing knowledge.

exams.name: Digital Marketing Fundamentals Certification
exams.description: Certify your team's expertise in SEO, SEM, and social media marketing. Ideal for agencies and marketing departments.

exams.name: Platform Administrator Practice
exams.description: A practice test covering the basics of managing your new examination portal.

exams.name: Platform Administrator Certification
exams.description: An exam for your clients to certify their ability to manage their tenant portal, including user management and content setup.

exams.name: WordPress Integration Practice
exams.description: Test your knowledge of integrating web applications with WordPress via REST APIs and SSO.

exams.name: WordPress Integration Specialist
exams.description: A technical certification for developers on your client's team, ensuring they can effectively integrate our platform with their WordPress site.

exams.name: PMP® Exam Preparation Practice
exams.description: A practice test covering key knowledge areas for the Project Management Professional exam.

exams.name: PMP® Exam Preparation
exams.description: A comprehensive exam for professionals seeking Project Management Professional (PMP®) certification.

exams.name: Certified ScrumMaster® Prep Practice
exams.description: Test your agile and Scrum knowledge with this practice exam.

exams.name: Certified ScrumMaster® Prep
exams.description: Prepare your team for the Certified ScrumMaster® (CSM) certification with this agile-focused exam.

exams.name: AWS Cloud Practitioner Practice
exams.description: A practice test for the AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner exam.

exams.name: AWS Cloud Practitioner Prep
exams.description: A foundational exam covering core AWS services, cloud concepts, security, and pricing.

certificateTemplates.title: Certificate of Proficiency
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating proficiency in the subject matter with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Certified Digital Marketing Professional
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating proficiency in Digital Marketing principles and practices with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Certified Platform Administrator
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating proficiency in managing the Annapoorna Examination App with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Certified WordPress Integration Specialist
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating proficiency in integrating applications with WordPress with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Project Management Professional (PMP®) Ready
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating advanced knowledge in project management principles with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Certified ScrumMaster® Ready
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating a strong understanding of Scrum and agile principles with a final score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner Ready
certificateTemplates.body: For successfully demonstrating foundational knowledge of AWS cloud services with a final score of {finalScore}%.

suggestedBooks.title: Digital Marketing For Dummies
suggestedBooks.description: An all-in-one guide to digital marketing, covering SEO, social media, content marketing, and more.

suggestedBooks.title: Platform Revolution
suggestedBooks.description: Understand how to create and manage successful platform businesses. A must-read for any tenant.

suggestedBooks.title: Professional WordPress Plugin Development
suggestedBooks.description: The definitive guide for developers looking to build robust and secure WordPress plugins for integration projects.

suggestedBooks.title: PMP Exam Prep, Tenth Edition
suggestedBooks.description: Rita Mulcahy's best-selling PMP exam prep book, updated for the latest exam content outline.

suggestedBooks.title: Essential Scrum: A Practical Guide
suggestedBooks.description: A practical guide to the Scrum framework, covering roles, artifacts, events, and principles.

suggestedBooks.title: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner Study Guide
suggestedBooks.description: A comprehensive guide to prepare for the CLF-C01 exam, covering all exam objectives and concepts.
